concept.title: Backup and restore
concept.shortdesc: Couchbase Server Enterprise Edition provides two new tools, cbbackupwrapper and cbrestorewrapper, that improve throughput for the database backup process. These tools provide a parallel processing approach to backing up a Couchbase cluster. They divide each vBucket space into a subset of vBuckets for each backup process, thus improving the speed and efficiency of the process.

conbody.note: Use the new tools instead of the standard backup tools, cbbackup and cbrestore, because the new tools address the single worker thread limitation for one backup/restore target (bucket node).
conbody.p: For more information about these tools, see Backup and restore.
